entities.name: ern
entities.description: Ern is mentioned as speaking in his slow voice and grunting in response to Stan's questions. He seems to be hesitant about Azkaban.

entities.name: stan
entities.description: Stan is mentioned as asking Ern questions and examining a newspaper picture of Black's face. He seems to be curious about Black's escape from Azkaban.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is mentioned in the context of his escape from Azkaban. His gaunt face is described in a newspaper picture.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as a place where Black was imprisoned and escaped from. It is also referred to as the location of Azkaban guards.

relationships.description: Ern has a fear of Azkaban, as mentioned in his response to Stan's question.
